error404.title: Page not found
error404.description: It seems that you tried to enter a page that is impossible to find or is no longer in use

metadata.public_home: On this page you will find the introduction to the painter's page
metadata.public_paint: On this page you will find all the paint information of the selected one
metadata.public_paints: On this page you will find all the painter's paints and you can filter them as follows
metadata.public_experience: On this page you will find all the experience information of the selected one
metadata.public_experiences: On this page you will find all the painter's experiences and you can filter them as follows
metadata.public_about_me: This page is dedicated to the painter and the path he has taken
metadata.public_contact: On this page you will be able to contact the painter by filling in a form
metadata.login: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to log in and modify the records
metadata.forgot_pw: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to request a password change
metadata.change_pw: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to set the new password
metadata.admin_paint: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to update the selected paint
metadata.admin_painter: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to update his personal and studio data
metadata.admin_paints: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to update his paints
metadata.admin_experience: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to update the selected experience
metadata.admin_experiences: This page is intended for the exclusive use of the painter to update his experiences
